name: twitter-streaming-framework
description: TypeScript/Node.js framework for processing Twitter data stream.

scripts.copyright: [ `find src -name "*.[jt]s" | wc -l` -eq `find src -name "*.[jt]s" -exec grep "Copyright 2021 Twitter" {} \; | wc -l` ] || echo Error: Missing copyright header

author: Avner Braverman
